text: Thank you for letting me know this is great. Can I also have the relevant field show in the section styles rather than the main theme styles? So here :point_down:

Hi Channel, I am using the “Flow” theme for our Quote, and the purchase terms I add from individual deals aren’t displaying. I did add content to our service terms section on the quote template, so I am trying to find out if I need custom code to force my purchase terms to ALSO show with my default terms.
Hi Marissa, are your purchase terms in a custom crm property?
are they attached to a contact, company, or deal or some other object?
No, just the standard ones that you set when you create a quote from a deal.
Looks like I just needed to add a personalization token from the quote properties into the template. Thanks for your help!
Ah, no, unfortunately. There isn’t currently any way to extend or customize the functionality of any of the dnd grid elements.
